name: 2025 3rd International Conference on Chemical, Energy Science and Environmental Engineering
content: 2025 3rd International Conference on Chemical, Energy Science and Environmental Engineering (CESEE 2025) will be hosted in Leuven, Belgium during May 28-31, 2025! It aims to create a cross-disciplinary and international summit that will bridge the gap between departmental, institutional, public and private research organizations, and global barriers, allowing for the integration of research, application and education in the emerging field of chemical, energy and environmental.
